title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite above Hebrew word:  of the earth; each Hebrew character accompanied by a number in graphite, reading right to left:  4,1,3,10,4 [all encircled]
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A Hebrew word (haadama) which translates as "of the earth."

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.Pen and black ink, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-77-c.
